summary: American boy Peter and blind minstrel Ivan are thrown together by fate amidst the turbulent mid-1930s Soviet Ukraine.
cast: Stanislav Boklan|Jeff Burrell|Anton Sviatoslav Greene|Andriy Haddad|Borys Heorhievskiy|Jamala|Aleksandr Kobzar|Oleg Primogenov|Irina Sanina|Serhiy Zhadan
title: Povodyr
